TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit UniqueKeyPolicy extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the unique key policy configuration for specifying uniqueness constraints on documents in the collection in the Azure Cosmos DB service.
Docs.remarks:
Unique key policies add a layer of data integrity to an Azure Cosmos container. They cannot be modified once the container is created.
Refer to https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cosmos-db/unique-keys for additional information on how to specify unique key policies.

Public ReadOnly Property UniqueKeys As Collection(Of UniqueKey)

Docs.summary: Gets collection of that guarantee uniqueness of documents in collection in the Azure Cosmos DB service.
